meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the nucleus of a cell.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the pronuclear changes in the cell.
meanings.sent2: The pronuclear material is essential for cell division.
meanings.sent3: The pronuclear dance of the cells was quite fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent4: The pronuclear connection within the cell was like the heart of a city.
meanings.sent5: The pronuclear glow illuminated the inner workings of the cell.

meanings.definition: Supporting or advocating for the formation of a nucleus.
meanings.sent1: The group held a pronuclear rally to promote unity.
meanings.sent2: She had a pronuclear stance on building a strong community.
meanings.sent3: Their pronuclear enthusiasm for teamwork was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The pronuclear spirit among the team was like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: His pronuclear efforts led to the establishment of a new nucleus in the organization.
